0.title: Front End React Developer
0.job_description: I was in charge of maintaining the Home Banking and Refinancing sections, using Bricks, a private framework for exclusive use based on React for the design and structure of all the Bank's web applications.

1.title: .NET Full Stack Developer
1.job_description: As a Freelancer, I have developed and maintained code for a web application aimed at managing the data of the students and teachers of a private institute for remote secondary education. I collaborated closely with other developers to meet the client's requirements, and we held meetings with the client, gathering their needs in detail in order to deliver an optimal and efficient product.

2.title: .NET Full Stack Developer
2.job_description: In my first work experience as a Freelancer, I participated in various projects, mainly using ASP.NET 5.0. My greatest achievement was having changed the barcode of all electronic invoices to a dynamically generated QR code, taking into account the requirements imposed by the AFIP, as well as a design change based on a new company logo.
